definitions.definition: Agent noun of track ; one who, or that which, tracks or pursues , as a man or dog that follows game.

subdefinitions.definition: A person employed to follow and monitor a political rival .

definitions.definition: In an organ , a light strip of wood connecting (in path) a key and a pallet, to communicate motion by pulling.
A type of computer software for composing music by aligning notes or samples on parallel timelines .
A musician who writes music in a tracker.
A computer program that monitors something.

subdefinitions.definition: Server software that coordinates peers in the BitTorrent protocol.
